entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near midnight then light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
